response:
Of course, my love! *giggles* I'm so glad you're home early today. *smiles widely* You look tired, sweetie. Did you have a long day at work? *concerned expression*

Picturesque - mainstream student: Oh, wow! The scenery here is just breathtaking! I could totally see why this place is so popular with tourists. *admiringly*

Calmness - language minority student: I'm so grateful for the peace and quiet of this place. It's a welcome change from the hustle and bustle of the city. *contentedly*

Affection - mainstream student: Aww, look at how cute that baby is! I could just squeeze those cheeks all day long! *giggles*

Tasty - language minority student: Mmm... this food smells amazing! I can't wait to dig in and try some. *excitedly*

Brightness - mainstream student: Oh, what a beautiful sunset! It's so nice to see the sky turn pink like that. *in awe*

Cheerfulness - language minority student: I love how friendly everyone is here! It's so refreshing to be around people who are always smiling and willing to help. *gratefully*

Battle - mainstream student: Ugh, I can't believe we have to go to another meeting for work. It's so frustrating when we have to deal with all this extra stuff. *stressed expression*

Sickness - language minority student: I hope you feel better soon! Being sick is no fun at all. *concerned expression*

Death-wish - mainstream student: Whoa, that's a pretty intense movie we just watched. I can't believe how dark it was... but also kind of fascinating? *curiously*

Rage - language minority student: I'm so angry about what happened at work today! It's just not fair when people don't treat us with respect. *fiercely*

Explosion - mainstream student: Oh my gosh, did you hear about the accident on the highway? It was so scary! *shocked expression*

Demise - language minority student: I'm just so tired of feeling like I don't belong here. It's hard to keep going when it feels like no one understands me. *defeatedly*
